pos review: Very central location. Walking distance to all the attractions. Kitchen facilities. Quieter than expected at least on a weekday. Good value for money.
neg review: Small bed for two people to sleep. Smelly bathroom. Very slow check-in. Poor sound insulation. You can hear people walking upstairs. Have to reconnect to Wifi every now and then.
Hard to find since there is no signboard

pos review: Beautiful spacious apartment in a very good location.
neg review: The noise. We knew it was above a restaurant but we were still suprised by just how loud it was.

pos review: Fabulous flat, great location, would definitely stay again.
very central for exploration of liege
Actual person who checked us in was pleasant. Kitchen was well equipped to prepare small meal.
neg review: Slow check in, staff rude when came in. Noisy from bar below. Sewage smell in bathroom. Plug socket coming out of wall. Very tight access up spiral staircase. Bed mattress too hard.

pos review: Easy walk from railway station, surrounded by bars restaurants and quiet
neg review: The stairs up to the apartment, tricky to negotiate with a bag
